snippet.title: Mechwarrior 3: Opening cinematic
snippet.description: The opening cinematic for the splendid 1999 sequel to the stupendous game that was Mechwarrior II. This game was good but I believe that it was not superior to its predecessor. Certainly on a graphical level it was a vast improvement, but that old DOS game ran game play rings around this iteration.
